node.excerpt:
Nutshell is the seventh, and last, design from the We are Animals I series, a
series of pieces portraying great minds wronged by humanity’s thoughts.
This piece shows Rosalind Franklin, English chemist and X-ray crystallographer 
whose work was central to the understanding of the molecular…

frontmatter.title: Nutshell
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Rosalind Franklin, English chemist and X-ray crystallographer whose work was central to the understanding of the molecular structures of DNA, RNA and viruses.
